title: Magazine Ad, "Tearsheet of an add for Schlumberger, "The Eyes of the Oil Industry"", 1958
medium: Lithography in red, black and yellow ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted vertically at upper left in white: Elaine Lustig
Across the center in yellow and white: The Eyes of the Oil Industry
At the bottom in red: SCHLUMBERGER
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The ad has a black background with two white screens showing activity waves. The word eye has the spaces in the e's filled in like eyes and the y extendes down to the bottom of the page to simulate their product.

tombstone.epitaph:
Magazine Ad, "Tearsheet of an add for Schlumberger, "The Eyes of the Oil Industry"", 1958.
1958. Lithography in red, black and yellow ink on white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-124.
